title: Stir-fried beef with broccoli and cashew nuts
description: Make this with our quick egg fried rice recipe and our blueberry sponge slice and youâ€™ve got yourself a supper for four in just 30 minutes. (Links in the recipe below).
ingredients: 2 x 200g sirloin steaks, trimmed of fat and thinly sliced
2.5cm piece fresh ginger, finely sliced into strips

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan over a high heat. Add the beef, in 2 batches, and stir-fry for 3 minutes. Remove the beef and set aside.

method.Step 2: Add the garlic, ginger and cashews and stir-fry for just a minute, then add the sweet chilli sauce, ketchup, soy sauce, chilli flakes and 100ml water. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the broccoli to the sauce and stir-fry for 2 minutes, then return the beef to the wok to heat through.

method.Step 3: Divide the quick egg fried rice (see recipe) among bowls and top with the beef.
